VEC.Q: How many ring layers are in this sunburst chart?
How many segments are in this sunburst chart?

VEC.Q: How many segments are in the outermost ring of this sunburst chart?
VEC.A: There are {5} segments in the outermost ring.

SRP.Q: Is Vegetable Hybrids positioned outside, inside or on the same side as Agricultural Inputs?
SRP.A: Vegetable Hybrids is positioned {outside} Agricultural Inputs.

VPR.Q: Which top-level category has the highest proportion in this sunburst chart?
VPR.A: The top-level category with the highest proportion is {Agricultural Inputs}.

VE.A: The value of the Hybrid Seeds segment is {25.13}.

NF.Q: Which categories in the segment Agricultural Inputs exceed 68%? Please list the category names and corresponding percentages.

NC.Q: Which is larger, the value of Agricultural Inputs or Seeds?
NC.A: The value of {Agricultural Inputs} is larger.

NC.Q: Which has the largest value: Agricultural Inputs, Seeds, Hybrid Seeds, or Cattle?
NC.A: The value of {Agricultural Inputs} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which hierarchical path in the sunburst chart makes the largest contribution to the total?
MSR.A: The path that contributes the most to the total is: {Agricultural Inputs to Seeds to Hybrid Seeds to Maize Hybrids}.
